text: Let's look at an example now of what a volume profile looks like. Firstly, as you can see the first chart, we've got traditional candlesticks. Now as you can see that price is depicted on the right, each candle is a time based candle and at the bottom we can see the volume. Now if we put this into a volume profile you can see it's the exact same information It's this volume profile chart that will allow us to easily identify patterns and remain objective.
transcript: Let's look at an example now of what a volume profile looks like. Firstly, as you can see the first chart, we've got traditional candlesticks. Now as you can see that price is depicted on the right, each candle is a time based candle and at the bottom we can see the volume. Now if we put this into a volume profile you can see it's the exact same information It's this volume profile chart that will allow us to easily identify patterns and remain objective.
